about_the_game:
Nemesis Galaxy at War is an adrenaline-pumping sci-fi asteroid space shooter that takes you on an endless journey through the cosmos! Set in a vast and unforgiving galaxy, you'll navigate your ship through asteroid fields, face off against relentless enemies, and battle fierce bosses in a quest for survival.

As you progress through infinite levels, the challenge grows with each passing wave, ensuring no two moments are the same. The deeper you venture into space, the more intense the battles become. Collect powerful upgrades along the way to enhance your weapons, boost your health, and activate shields that can turn the tide of battle in your favor.

With dynamic combat, strategic power-ups, and an ever-increasing difficulty curve, Nemesis Galaxy at War delivers an exhilarating experience for both casual players and hardcore shooters. Can you survive the chaos of space and emerge victorious against the galaxy's fiercest foes? The war is just beginning—brace yourself for the ultimate test!
